snippet: A Brooklyn woman is trying to keep from losing her home, and she isn’t getting much assistance from elected officials.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column observes that New York City politicians are not the equals of their constituents, with many officials embroiled in scandals; notes that a Brooklyn woman who is trying to keep from losing her home, is getting little assistance from elected officials.
lead_paragraph: A Brooklyn woman is trying to keep from losing her home, and she isn’t getting much assistance from elected officials.

headline.print_headline: When the Politicians Who Should Be Helping Are Only Out to Help Themselves
headline.seo: She Could Use Some Help, but Too Many Politicians Only Help Themselves
headline.main: When the Politicians Who Should Be Helping Are Only Out to Help Themselves
